dcterms:title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (Theatrical Poster)
dcterms:alternative: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World One-Sheet
dcterms:creator: Empire Design (Design Agency); Oscar Wright (Concept)
dcterms:subject: Film Poster; Key Art; Graphic Design
dcterms:description: Official theatrical poster designed by Empire Design. Features Scott Pilgrim (Michael Cera) with a bass guitar against a red background, mimicking the graphic novel style. Released ahead of the 2010 premiere.
